title: Scapular
description: Once per room when you are damaged down to your final half a heart, you gain 1 soul heart
Re-entering a room allows this effect to be triggered again
Counts as 1 of 3 angel items needed towards the Seraphim transformation.
REPENTANCE - Scapular won't grant its soul heart if the player is attempting to proc it with certain heart donation mechanics (such as IV Bag)
